title: ‘Gold bars’ at Saudi wedding? What looked like 24-carat gifts was something else
summary_full: A wedding video sparked global buzz with claims of gold bar gifts.  The footage showed what looked like solid gold biscuits being distributed.  However, these were actually luxury chocolates wrapped in gold foil.  The brand Patchi is known for such confections.  The event was real, but the gifts were sweets, not precious metal.
